text: Berberis jamesonii is a species of plant in the family Berberidaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical high- altitude grassland. ==References== jamesonii Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Least concern plants Category:Least concern biota of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by John Lindley
title: Berberis jamesonii
